title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 325-3.5 - Limited licenses
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 325-3.5 - Limited licenses

State Regulations
A bureau license may be given for a stated project which, because of the hazards of the project and the frequency of accidents, requires
continued medical care and such license shall be for the life of the given
project only. In such cases all employees of all subcontractors shall be
covered by the license. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
325-3.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
